ops.mr: Execute script #%3 in extern group %1 (priority %2/6) - Only if the script is not already running|_script(groupID)|priority|scriptID

ops.js: fade({r:255, g:0, b:0, speed:100, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:100, type:5, adjust:255});
fade({r:255, g:0, b:0, speed:100, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:100, type:5, adjust:255});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:1}); // Bugenhagen
“As you can see, this cave
leads to the back of Cosmo Canyon.”{PAUSE}“Even though the Gi outnumbered
us, they could not attack
through here because the
passage is too narrow.”
